actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the President to posthumously award a gold medal on behalf of Congress to Elizabeth Wanamaker Peratrovich and Roy Peratrovich in recognition of their outstanding and enduring contributions to the civil rights and dignity of the Native peoples of Alaska and the Nation.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Authorizes the President, on behalf of the Congress, to award a gold medal of appropriate design posthumously to Elizabeth Wanamaker Peratrovich and Roy Peratrovich, in recognition of their outstanding and enduring contributions to the civil rights and dignity of the Native peoples of Alaska and the Nation.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President to posthumously award a gold medal on behalf of Congress to Elizabeth Wanamaker Peratrovich and Roy Peratrovich in recognition of their outstanding and enduring contributions to the civil rights and dignity of the Native peoples of Alaska and the Nation.
